++ Velsharoon

An ancient human who ascended to godhood through master of necromancy, becoming a lich.

Deemed to be a threat, [Venril Sathir] turned him instead into a powerful asset

Velsharoon passively emminates a mass suggestion effect to all around him, who passively take necrotic damage.


Crypts:
  -Northern [Order of Steel] temple in [Luthadel]
  -Under the palace in [Nicosia]
  -The catacombs in the peak to the north of [Nicosia]
